meanings.definition: A person who seeks the affection or love of another.
meanings.sent1: The wooers brought flowers and chocolates to impress their crushes.
meanings.sent2: The park was filled with wooers trying to win the hearts of their beloved.
meanings.sent3: The wooers competed in a friendly contest to win the attention of the charming lady.
meanings.sent4: Like bees to nectar, the wooers buzzed around the object of their affection.
meanings.sent5: The wooers' efforts to win over their love interests were both sweet and endearing.
